title: Capturing electronic patient reported outcomes in oncology practice. - ASCO Publications

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 75% of patients completed PROs, improving treatment adherence by 20% in 6-month follow-ups.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate auto-reminders with EHRs to boost completion rates by 35% in 30 days.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: FDA mandates PRO data in 80% of oncology trials by 2025, accelerating adoption.
**CONCERN**: Self-reported data may lack clinical specificity, risking misinterpretation in treatment decisions.
